direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle index-based insertion with growth behavior, sharing similar control flow and exception handling.
Both methods modify the list at a specified index, with growth behavior for indices beyond the current size.
The external method addAll(Collection<? extends E>) from the List interface can be substituted with the target method by specifying an index of 0.
The target method relies on the nCopies method from Collections to fill indices with null values, indicating a strong dependency.
